translation.en: - I feel like a proud show dog that didn't understand her days were numbered.
translation.ko: 살날이 얼마 안 남은 걸 모르는 애완견이 된 기분이야

translation.en: Like look at these things; it's just like chicken skin.
translation.ko: 여기 좀 봐 마치 닭 껍질 같아

translation.en: - What are you talking about? Yours are okay.
translation.ko: 무슨 말을 하는 거야? 전혀 문제없어 보여

translation.en: - Look, they're not winning any blue ribbons, okay,
but they stuck in there.
You know, they may be a little deflated, but they're not throwing in the towel.
translation.ko: 약간 늘어지긴 했지만 못 봐줄 정도는 아니야

translation.en: I like 'em. - I'm with you.
I mean, I'm not starring in a porno anytime soon,
but I breast fed my first for five months.
This is where they landed.
I mean, it could be worse, right?
No, you know what, it could be better.
translation.ko: 이보다 더했을 수도 있잖아? - 잘 된 건지도 몰라 - 맞아

translation.en: - It could be better. Look it could be better.
translation.ko: - 잘 된 건지도 몰라 - 맞아 좋아요

translation.en: Val: Okay, I think we need to rein it in here, ladies.
After breastfeeding, I think it's best that you put yourselves away.
translation.ko: 모유 수유 후에는 자신을 내려놓는 게 좋아요

translation.en: - I wasn't even breastfeeding. It just looked refreshing.
translation.ko: 저는 수유 중도 아닌데 시원해 보이더라고요

translation.en: - That's weird. - You're weird, Alicia,
translation.ko: 이상해 이상한 건 네가 만든 기저귀 가방이지, 알리사

translation.en: with your homemade diaper bag.
translation.ko: 이상한 건 네가 만든 기저귀 가방이지, 알리사

translation.en: - Baby Mabel likes her bag.
Baby Mabel does not like that bag.
translation.ko: 마음에 들어 하는 거 아니야 아직 그럴 나이가 아니거든

translation.en: She doesn't like anything yet 'cause she's a baby.
translation.ko: 마음에 들어 하는 거 아니야 아직 그럴 나이가 아니거든 - 아직 아기니까 - 아직 아기지

translation.en: - She's a baby. - Okay!
Today, I thought we'd talk about how many of you are coming up
translation.ko: 오늘은 여러분의 출산 휴가가 얼마나 남았는지

translation.en: on the end of your maternity leave.
Kate, I overheard you're going back to work.
Are you excited?
- Uh... Yeah.
A little intimidated, I guess.
What's the trick to making all this work?
I'm trying to stay positive, it's just...
having it all seems a little...
impossible. (Nervous chuckle)
- I find the key is setting boundaries for yourself.
translation.ko: 자신이 한계를 정하는 게 비결이라고 생각해요

translation.en: A good place to start is committing to being home for the evening routine.
translation.ko: 먼저 저녁엔 집에 있도록 노력해 보세요

translation.en: - Okay. - Anyone else feeling
any back-to-work jitters?
This is a safe place.
- Yeah. I've got my first open house today.
I'm not totally solid about it.
I think I might just have the teensiest little drop of postpartum.
translation.ko: 아주 약한 산후 우울증이 왔나 봐요

translation.en: I was driving this morning and...
I fantasized that a car would just hit me, you know?
- Take me away from all of this, you know?
Not kill me. I'm not suicidal.
translation.ko: 죽으면 안 되죠 자살하겠다는 게 아니에요

translation.en: - No. - Just... (Laughing)
No. Sorry, guys, sorry.
Just leave me brain dead for like a week, you know?
translation.ko: 한 일주일 정도만 뇌사 상태가 되는 거예요

translation.en: Ten days, actually. It just felt easier.
translation.ko: 사실 열흘 정도가 좋겠네요 더 수월해지겠어

translation.en: - She's talking about a vacation. - Yes! Yes.
Like a brain dead vacation.
♪ It keeps you always on the run ♪
Male reporter: ... the bear has been missing since last night.
Authorities are urging all surrounding neighborhoods
to be cautious and to report all sightings...
translation.ko: 당국은 인근 지역에 주의를 당부하며 목격 시 신고하도록...

translation.en: Hmm, yeah, just for today maybe skip the park.
For Olly's sake and Charlie's.
So I left a pretty detailed schedule,
but I will be back for bath time.
translation.ko: 전 목욕 때쯤에 돌아 올 거예요

translation.en: So do not give him a bath because I will be doing that.
translation.ko: 제가 목욕 시킬 테니 목욕은 시키지 말아 주세요

translation.en: - Babies like that, huh? - Hey, that's a pretty song.
translation.ko: - 아기가 좋아하나 보죠? - 노래가 듣기 좋네요

translation.en: Why don't you try singing to him more? - I don't like singing.
translation.ko: - 애한테 노래 좀 더 해줘 - 난 노래 부르는 게 싫더라

translation.en: - I thought you had to get going.
I do. Okay, Mommy's gotta go to work
translation.ko: - 가봐야 하지 않아? - 맞아 엄마는 일 다녀올 테니

translation.en: and you're gonna spend the day with Rebecca.
- Yay! Rebecca! - Yay!
Nathan: You're gonna be late.
Kate: Yeah, I'm just saying goodbye.
translation.ko: 당신 늦겠어 작별인사 좀 하고 전통적인 지구의 문화잖아

translation.en: It's a traditional custom here on earth.
translation.ko: 작별인사 좀 하고 전통적인 지구의 문화잖아

translation.en: - All right. - We say goodbye. - All right. Goodbye. I love you.
- Bye! - Bye bye.
- Bye.
When you have a bond like this, hard to break it up.
translation.ko: 끈끈한 유대를 갖고 있죠 떨어지기 힘들어요

translation.en: - They're gonna fire you, Kate. - Okay, all right, cool. Here you go.
translation.ko: - 아무 일 없을 거야 - 알겠어, 여기요

translation.en: - Well, would you look who is off the bench.
- Richard! (Laughs)
- Great to see ya.
- Uh... - Okay. Okay.
- All right. Okay. - That's good.
- Hard to believe you're somebody's mommy now, huh?
- Yeah, don't I know it.
Gotta say thought, it feels real good to be in here.
- Oh, girls got you some cupcakes or something.
They're around here somewhere. - Did you want them, I can find them.
translation.ko: - 여기 어디에 있을 거야 - 제가 찾아볼게요

translation.en: They're probably in the kitchen.
Oh, I'm sorry, Ms. Foster. I am your new assistant, Rosie.
translation.ko: 포스터 씨, 새로 조수로 일하게 된 로지라고 해요

translation.en: - Hey, hey, nice to meet you, Rosie. You can call me Kate.
- Kate. Kate, Kate, Kate. Okay.
- So, HR tells me you have a room to do your...
translation.ko: 인사과에서 자네가 모유 수유를 할 수 있도록

translation.en: milking thing. - Yes, this office.
- Oh, that'll... that'll put on quite a show.
- Yeah, I think I'll use the bathroom.
I hear Happy Farms Dairy is coming in.
- Yeah. President passed away leaving the wife in charge,
translation.ko: '해피 팜 데어리'가 온다는 이야기를 들었어요 회장님이 사모님에게 회사를 맡기고 세상을 떠나셔서

translation.en: and she's making a tour of PR firms.
translation.ko: 사모님이 홍보 회사를 둘러 보고 계셔

translation.en: - Would love a chance to pitch. Never felt closer to being a cow myself,
translation.ko: 제가 해보고 싶어요 젖소랑도 아주 비슷한 상태고요

translation.en: so if it's not already-- Mo: Covered?
Yeah, I've been researching farms all week.
- Kate, I want you to meet Mo. He's a new VP.
translation.ko: 케이트, 모를 소개해 주지 새로운 부사장이야

translation.en: VP, huh?
Mo Daniels. Vasero and Burns?
translation.ko: 부사장요? 모 대니얼스가요? - '바세로 앤 번즈'요? - 스카우트 됐어요

translation.en: - They poached me.
- He's been firing on all cylinders.
- Just try to live up to the legend of Kate Foster.
translation.ko: 그저 케이트 포스터의 전설에 부응하려 한 것뿐입니다

translation.en: You got quite a legacy around here.
- Oh, thanks. Yeah.
Can't tell you how strange it is
translation.ko: 가장 유능할 때 아이가 생긴 게

translation.en: to get pregnant right at the top of my game.
Yeah, the only thing that'd keep me out of these offices would be a fire.
translation.ko: 저를 회사에서 떠나게 할 유일한 존재는 화재일 겁니다

translation.en: - Yeah, well, look, I know you've got it covered,
but if you'd like a female perspective today with Happy Farms,
translation.ko: 혹시 '해피 팜'에 관한 여성의 시각이 필요하다면

translation.en: I'd be happy to be your second. - Hey, that sounds good. Mo?
- Absolutely. I'll send you some materials.
- Great! Can't wait to sink my teeth in.
- I'm gonna get some coffee in me. See you guys at the meeting.
translation.ko: 전 커피 마시러 갈게요 회의에서 봬요

translation.en: - Yeah, yeah. It's, uh, the kitchen--
- I know where the kitchen is. - Yeah, you already... know.
- Um, so check with my girl. I think the meeting is 4-ish.
- Oh, and that'll run what, like an hour or...?
- I don't know. Why? You got somewhere to be?
- Sorry. Yeah, I'm just trying to be home by bath time.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만, 목욕 시간에 맞춰서 가봐야 해서요

translation.en: - Bath time, huh? Hmm. I prefer showers, but to each their own.
translation.ko: 목욕 시간? 난 샤워가 좋지만 사람마다 다르겠지

translation.en: Should be fine. - Thank you.
Honestly, how long does it take?
Not you, you're doing great.
Is everything cool down there?
What's happening? I've got something, right?
- Anne, you're pregnant. - No.
- I'll try that again. - Can you just check again?
Because I had a baby eight months ago.
translation.ko: 다시 확인해 보세요 8개월 전에 아이를 낳았거든요

translation.en: She's barely alive yet.
translation.ko: 다시 확인해 보세요 8개월 전에 아이를 낳았거든요 아직 생명체라기도 뭐해요

translation.en: - Well, it's lucky for you and this baby
translation.ko: 아직 생명체라기도 뭐해요 절 찾아온 건 당신에게도 아이에게도 행운입니다

translation.en: that you came in to see me
translation.ko: 절 찾아온 건 당신에게도 아이에게도 행운입니다

translation.en: so you can change your behaviour.
You taken up smoking by any chance? - No.
I have been partaking in other forms of medicine, though.
- Psychiatrist or not, you know the drill, Anne.
translation.ko: 정신과 의사가 아니더라도 잘 아실 겁니다 전부 끊으셔야 해요

translation.en: You're gonna have to cut all that stuff out.
translation.ko: 잘 아실 겁니다 전부 끊으셔야 해요

translation.en: Completely.
Frankie: I think that's Havarti.
Might be some Gouda in there, if we're lucky.
translation.ko: 운이 좋다면 고우다 치즈도 있을 수 있어요

translation.en: Oh, don't see any.
Right, so...
Uh, central vac.
Sub-zero fridge.
This kitchen really, really has it all.
translation.ko: 이 부엌은 정말... 빠지는 구석이 없어요

translation.en: - It's pretty perfect.
- We heard a couple planes going by. Is this on a flight path?
translation.ko: 비행기 소리가 들리는데 비행경로에 놓여 있나요?

translation.en: - Oh yeah, you think a plane door is gonna fall from the sky? Just, (crashing sounds)
right through your bedroom ceiling?
Well, from that altitude, it's gonna go through you like taffy.
translation.ko: 그 정도 높이에서 떨어지면 아주 산산조각이 나겠네요

translation.en: - Excuse me? - Well, you're not gonna survive that one,
tell you that much. (Laughs)
Hey, babe. How's your day goin'?
translation.ko: 안녕, 자기야 하루 잘 보내고 있어?

translation.en: - We're having a great time. Aren't we, Rhoda?
translation.ko: 잘 보내고 있지 그렇지 않니, 로다?

translation.en: Hi, Mommy. Hi, Mommy. Hi, Mommy.
How was the open house?
- Oh yeah, it's fantastic. It's just packed in there.
Lots of serious interest.
translation.ko: 사람도 많고 다들 관심 있어 해

translation.en: - Then why are you outside?
- Because I've been politely asked to remain outdoors.
- Who asked you that? - Oh, I don't know. A few people.
Anyway, it's no big deal.
- Are you okay, babe? You seem out of it.
translation.ko: - 별일 아니야 - 괜찮아, 자기야? - 겉도는 것처럼 보여 - 장난해?

translation.en: - Are you kidding? No, I'm like, in it.
translation.ko: - 겉도는 것처럼 보여 - 장난해? 완전히 참여 중이야

translation.en: (Baby crying) Like, deep in.
- Okay, baby. I'll call you back.
- Have a good day! (Hangs up)
- I gotta be back in 15 minutes.
- Yeah, I know. I just gotta pay this thing.
- You okay?
- Yes, I just-- Stop hounding me.
translation.ko: - 괜찮아? - 응 나 좀 그만 몰아세워

translation.en: - Okay, what's going on right now?
I'm sensing something. - What is with the interrogation?
translation.ko: - 뭔가 있는 것 같은데 - 취조하는 거야?

translation.en: I just need to eat and not take pills,
translation.ko: 식사 좀 하면 돼 약은 먹지 말고

translation.en: and pay this worthless pain-in-the-tits meter.
(Meter whirs) Oh, there.
- Wait, why can't you take pills?
Hold up. - What? What is it?
- Are you? Not again!
- What, if you got something to say, why don't you just spit it out.
translation.ko: 할 말 있으면 그냥 말하지 그래?

translation.en: Aren't we above that, who says it first?
translation.ko: 상관이 있나? 누가 먼저 말하는 게?

translation.en: - Above what, Kate? - You're pregnant.
- Yeah, I am. - Congratulations.
- Thanks, I'm thrilled about it.
- Oh yeah, this is gonna be good. This was a good call. - Uh-huh.
You tell Lionel? - No, too nervous.
Never wanted three. Two and through.
translation.ko: 셋은 절대 원한 적 없어 둘이면 됐지

translation.en: - Well, you know you got options, right.
translation.ko: 글쎄... 다른 선택도 있는 건 알지?

translation.en: - What the hell's the matter with you? Why would you even say that?
translation.ko: 넌 대체 뭐가 문제야? 그 얘기는 왜 꺼내?

translation.en: - I'm just saying you're not stuck. If two kids are enough, great, you know.
translation.ko: 두 명이 충분하다고 생각하면 다른 선택지도 있다는 거야

translation.en: No need to ruin the marriage break the bank on a whoopsie.
translation.ko: 한순간 실수로 결혼 생활과 통장 잔액을 망칠 필요는 없잖아

translation.en: - I just...got to know these two personalities
translation.ko: 난 그저... 내가 무에서 창조해낸 두 생명체를 알아가야 해

translation.en: that we made from scratch, you know?
translation.ko: 내가 무에서 창조해낸 두 생명체를 알아가야 해

translation.en: Child: No! No! No!
- Shut it, you monster. Your mother's a goddamn angel.
translation.ko: 입 다물어, 이 괴물아 네 엄마는 굉장한 천사라고!

translation.en: - Thank you.
- Makes things a little more complicated, that's all.
Hello?
Yes, this is Kate.
Um no, I'm not busy at all.
Yes, I did read about that account.
Ah no, that was just um...
they're doing some plumbing on the building.
Can I call you back?
No, no, no, no, no.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼, 안 돼

translation.en: Oh shit.
Easy does it.
Oh God, all right, I am killin' it.
- Everything okay? Because I--
- I just need some paper towels. I had a spill.
- Of course, yeah.
Just checking though. You got Mo's memo... that the meeting got moved up to 3?
- What memo? I never saw a memo.
- Uh, I put it on your desk at lunch.
- Well, it's not there now, and it's 3:20.
translation.ko: - 책상에 올려 뒀어요 - 없었어요, 3시 20분이잖아 - 휴지 좀 갖다 주시겠어요? - 네

translation.en: Can you give me some paper towels?
- Yeah, mhmm. - Shit.
Okay, okay.
No!
- I swear I left it on your desk.
Oh um, did you see the memo because I put it right--
So weird it was right there.
- Yeah, well. Yeah, I don't have time.
translation.ko: 당신 탐정 놀이에 함께 할 시간도 없고

translation.en: To watch you play detective, or any of this tom foolery.
translation.ko: 당신 탐정 놀이에 함께 할 시간도 없고 바보 같은 짓 할 시간도 없어요 덕분에 우스운 꼴이 됐네요

translation.en: You're making me look ridiculous.
translation.ko: 바보 같은 짓 할 시간도 없어요 덕분에 우스운 꼴이 됐네요

translation.en: Mo: With the company moving in this new and might I add, brave, direction,
translation.ko: 새로우면서도 과감하기까지 한 방향으로 회사가 나아가니

translation.en: I believe it's your moment to showcase dairy
translation.ko: 낙농업 홍보를 여성의 관점으로 진행할 때가

translation.en: as a woman would.
translation.ko: 낙농업 홍보를 여성의 관점으로 진행할 때가 왔다고 믿습니다

translation.en: - This should be good.
- Wholesome.
Maternal.
Sweet.
I believe this is the moment for Happy Farms Dairy,
translation.ko: '해피 팜 데어리'가 여성들을 모아야 할 때가 왔다고 믿습니다

translation.en: to bring women together. Everywhere.
translation.ko: 여성들을 모아야 할 때가 왔다고 믿습니다 모든 여성을요

translation.en: - What the hell does that even mean?
Is that it?
- No, no, no. Of course not. Mo? - I um...
Yeah, I-I had the design team put together some images.
- Yeah, I think I get the idea.
- Yeah, Mrs. Sheffield,
what Mo's pitching, is only part of it.
- Is that breast milk on your shirt? - It is.
Look, Mo's right. Women are watching.
translation.ko: 모의 말이 맞아요 여성들이 주시하고 있죠

translation.en: But not just any woman's point of view will work here.
translation.ko: 하지만 여느 여성의 관점이 통하진 않을 겁니다

translation.en: But yours would.
Your history, your face, actually.
- My face?
Oh no, people want their dairy with sunny farm animals on it,
translation.ko: 내 얼굴을? 안 돼요 사람들이 원하는 건 동물이지 노인네 얼굴이 아니에요

translation.en: not old ladies. (Richard chuckles)
translation.ko: 사람들이 원하는 건 동물이지 노인네 얼굴이 아니에요

translation.en: - People want a story.
Consumers are familiar with your product,
but they don't know that you, unlike your husband, were raised on a farm.
translation.ko: 남편분과 달리 사모님이 농장에서 자란 사실은 모르죠

translation.en: And at the age of seven you were pulling those hours,
while your husband inherited the company.
My biggest accomplishment at seven was microwaving cheese on to chips.
translation.ko: 전 7살 때 전자레인지로 과자에 치즈를 녹인 게 최고 업적이에요

translation.en: - Nachos. - Mhm.
Look, not only do you speak to women, but you've got the calloused hands to back it up.
translation.ko: 여성과 소통할 뿐만 아니라 사모님은 경험 또한 있으세요

translation.en: Yes, my husband did inherit the company from his grandfather.
translation.ko: 제 남편이 조부로부터 회사를 물려받긴 했지만

translation.en: And his grandmother wasn't even allowed in a meeting like this.
translation.ko: 조모는 이런 회의에 참석조차 할 수 없었죠

translation.en: So I came along they thought I was cracked in the head.
translation.ko: 내가 나타나자 다들 내가 미친 줄 알았어요

translation.en: He couldn't milk a cow, but he stood by me.
translation.ko: 남편은 소 젖도 못 짰지만 내 편이 되어 주었죠

translation.en: - Sounds like a smart man.
- Yes, he was. - Mrs. Sheffield,
if this is a route you feel comfortable taking,
I'd be happy to put together a detailed plan for you.
- Yeah.
- Lovely. - Good.
Richard: Great to meet you. Mrs. Sheffield: Yes, thank you very much.
(Door opens) - Nice catch, Kate.
Mo, take note. People want a narrative.
translation.ko: 잘했어, 케이트 모, 받아 적게나 사람들은 이야기를 원한다 케이트, 선두에 설 준비가 됐나?

translation.en: Kate, you ready to take the lead on this?
translation.ko: 사람들은 이야기를 원한다 케이트, 선두에 설 준비가 됐나?

translation.en: - Yeah, you bet. Mo, it was a good idea, she just needed more nurturing.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 살을 더 붙이기만 하면 될 좋은 발상이었어요, 모

translation.en: Richard: Okay, come on.
Let's take 5, dive right in. Natalie!
- What the...? What the hell are you...?
- Oh my God.
What a peaceful way to go.
So... (clears throat)
You guys feelin' that house?
It's got a pool.
- Hey babe, did you order anything? I'm starving.
Where's the kids?
Where? Downstairs?
What?
- I don't wanna talk about it.
Okay, you got me in the damn patient's chair.
- Oh my God.
- All right, I got a feeling this is about
that loan I took out? Is this what I'm picking up?
translation.ko: 내가 대출한 일 때문인가? 그런 느낌이 드는데 맞아, 내가 낭비벽이 있긴 해

translation.en: Yeah, I get it. I can be an excessive spender.
translation.ko: 그런 느낌이 드는데 맞아, 내가 낭비벽이 있긴 해

translation.en: I get where you're coming from.
But you have to trust me when I say, this is gonna work out.
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 괜찮다고 하면 나를 믿어줘야 해

translation.en: - Okay, I can't do this. We can't do this and...
I'll take care of it.
- Good. That's initiative. What are you going to take care of, exactly?
translation.ko: 좋아, 그게 시작이지 근데 뭘 알아서 한다는 거야?

translation.en: - You don't want to know. I'll just um... I got it. Don't worry about it.
translation.ko: 알고 싶지 않을 거야 내가 알아서 할 테니 걱정 마

translation.en: It's fine. God, these little bastards are so good.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 세상에 이 싸구려들 정말 맛있네

translation.en: - What are you talking about? You hate those things.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 당신 그거 진짜 싫어하잖아

translation.en: Except for when you're...
Ah...are you...?
Was it margarita night?
- I'm so sorry. I don't... I have no idea.
I don't know uh-- - This is amazing.
- What? - Baby, this is how I grow.
translation.ko: - 뭐? - 자기야 나는 이런 식으로 성장해, 그렇지?

translation.en: Right?
We got married, you were totally out of my league,
translation.ko: 당신은 내가 넘볼 사람이 아니었는데 우린 결혼했고

translation.en: so, I got cooler.
translation.ko: 당신은 내가 넘볼 사람이 아니었는데 우린 결혼했고 내가 더 멋져졌지 우린 이곳도 감당할 수 없었어

translation.en: We couldn't afford this place.
translation.ko: 내가 더 멋져졌지 우린 이곳도 감당할 수 없었어 그래서 내가 더 좋은 직업을 얻었지

translation.en: So, you know what, I went out and I got a better job.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 더 좋은 직업을 얻었지

translation.en: I-I don't know how I'm gonna take care of three kids.
I honestly have no clue, but I promise you,
translation.ko: 솔직히 전혀 감이 안 와 하지만 언제나 그랬던 것처럼 내가 더 발전한다고 약속할 게

translation.en: that I will rise to the occasion, like I always do.
translation.ko: 하지만 언제나 그랬던 것처럼 내가 더 발전한다고 약속할 게

translation.en: Because baby...
I'm a grower.
- I love when you're soft like this. - Oh, shut up.
translation.ko: - 당신이 이렇게 약할 때가 좋더라 - 닥쳐

translation.en: - Okay, so there's no second date?
translation.ko: 그래서 두 번째 데이트는 안 했어요?

translation.en: - She stunk like neediness.
- Aw, man. I hate that. I get it all the time.
translation.ko: 그런 거 정말 싫어요 저도 항상 그런 사람을 만나죠

translation.en: - No. Mo: Aren't you like, 17?
- No, I'm 26. - You're 26. Show us your ID.
- Do not pick on him, it's like picking on a Chihuahua.
translation.ko: 그러지 말아요 치와와를 괴롭히는 것 같잖아

translation.en: - Okay. (All laugh)
- Shouldn't you be at home right now, putting your baby to bed, or something?
- That's right, Kate. Did you have a hard out?
- Well, you guys need me here. The work's not done.
translation.ko: 제가 필요하잖아요 아직 일도 마무리되지 않았고

translation.en: - Ooh. Nice priorities.
- Look, my kid's not exactly being robbed of the good life.
translation.ko: 제 아이의 행복한 삶이 강탈당하는 게 아니에요

translation.en: You remember the good life, Mo.
Breastfeeding off your poor mother, 'til you could tie your own shoes.
translation.ko: 혼자 신발을 신을 때까지 불쌍한 엄마에게서 모유 수유를 받는 거요

translation.en: - Once again, I breastfed for a normal amount of time.
translation.ko: 다시 한번 말하지만 남들만큼 모유 수유 받았어요

translation.en: - Down girl, we're just messin' wit ya.
- Your baby calling nanny "mom", yet?
translation.ko: 아직 아기가 보모를 엄마라고는 안 해요?

translation.en: You think she likes it?
- You okay, Kate?
- Yeah, I'm fine. (crying)
- Shit, Kate. I was just fucking with you, you know?
- It's just that he uh...
he said his first word today.
He said "bubble".
He's never even seen a bubble.
and I missed it. That moment's gone.
translation.ko: 제가 놓쳤으니 그 순간은 이제 사라진 거죠

translation.en: - Look, maybe you should go home.
- I wanna work.
♪ Run and that I did but through the dust ♪
♪ From which I could not flee ♪ ♪ So go on, shake me, ♪
- Hey... buddy.
- Hey, are you okay?
Hey, hey it's okay.
The Filipino song...
How does it go?
